description:
This spacious hooped vestibule practically adds a new wing to your Big House 4 home-away-from-home. It's big enough for large soggy dogs or dining out of the wind and rain.

  • Includes a lightweight aluminum pole, aluminum hook stakes and reflective guylines
  • Internal floor dimensions are 1.91 x 2.28m. Maximum height inside is 1.52m
  • Maximum height inside is 1.52m
  • Compatible with 2020 and newer versions of the Big Agnes Big House 6 Tent
  • Since the Big House tents are large, high-profile tents, we recommend staking out all stake-out points and all guy outs for the most stability, especially in windy conditions
name: Big Agnes Big House 4-Person Vestibule
